title: Executive Order 6765-Allocation of Funds for an Addition to the Executive Office Building
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me under title II of the Emergency Appropriation Act, fiscal year 1935, approved June 19, 1934 (Public, No. 412, 73d Cong.), appropriating, among other sums, the sum of $325,000 for an addition to the Executive Office Building and for the furnishings and equipment thereof, the said sum of $325,000 is hereby allocated to the Secretary of the Interior for expenditure for such purpose by the National Park Service of the Department of the Interior, during the fiscal year 1935.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6765-Allocation of Funds for an Addition to the Executive Office Building Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362544
